Adventure Guildsman:
The world is a dark and scary place, my friend! If everyone would only follow the teachings of Eve and Einhasad, this chaos would finally end!
What's needed is brave warrior like you stand up for the down-trodden, to restore peace and justice to the world! are you up to the task?
